Class playn.core.Graphics

Changed from an interface to a class.

Removed Methods
Font createFont(String, Style, float) Creates a font with the specified configuration.
GroupLayer createGroupLayer() Creates a group layer.
Clipped createGroupLayer(float, float) Creates a clipped group layer, with the initial clipping size.
CanvasImage createImage(float, float) Creates an image that can be painted using the Canvas interface.
ImageLayer createImageLayer() Creates an image layer with no configured image.
ImageLayer createImageLayer(Image) Creates an image layer with the supplied image.
ImmediateLayer createImmediateLayer(Renderer) Creates an unclipped immediate layer.
Clipped createImmediateLayer(int, int, Renderer) Creates an immediate layer that is clipped to the specified rectangular region.
Gradient createLinearGradient(float, float, float, float, int[], float[]) Creates a linear gradient fill pattern.
Gradient createRadialGradient(float, float, float, int[], float[]) Creates a radial gradient fill pattern.
SurfaceImage createSurface(float, float) Creates an image that can be rendered into using the Surface interface.
GLContext ctx() Returns the GL context on platforms that use GL, null otherwise.
GL20 gl20() Returns a reference to the GL context.
int height() Gets the height of the drawable surface, in pixels.
GroupLayer rootLayer() Returns the root of the scene graph.
float scaleFactor() Returns the display scale factor.
int screenHeight() Gets the height of the available screen real-estate, in pixels.
int screenWidth() Gets the width of the available screen real-estate, in pixels.
int width() Gets the width of the drawable surface, in pixels.
 

Added Methods
Canvas createCanvas(float, float) Creates a Canvas with the specified display unit size.
Canvas createCanvas(IDimension) See .createCanvas(float,float).
Texture createTexture(float, float, Config) Creates an empty texture into which one can render.
Texture createTexture(IDimension, Config) See .createTexture(float,float,Texture.Config).
void queueForDispose(Closeable) Queues the supplied graphics resource for disposal on the next frame tick.
Scale scale() Returns the display scale factor.
IDimension screenSize() Returns the size of the screen in display units.
 

Added Fields
RenderTarget defaultRenderTarget The render target for the default framebuffer.
GL20 gl Provides access to GL services.
IDimension viewSize The current size of the graphics viewport.
